page.title: 16Worlingworth Senior Villager
page.content: Q1What part has Worlingworth played in your life? A1We raised our family here.All went to the village school & the Baptist Chapel at Horham.The farm has expanded from 105 to 400 acres & is now a partnership Q2How has it changed over the years? A2Farming has changed.Everybody used to walk or cycle but now they have cars & go on holidays.When I came in 1943 I knew everybody but now people move in & out & you never get to know them. Q3What in your opinion does the future hold for Worlingworth & the surrounding villages? A3Smaller work force,smaller families, longer lifespan & just old people left in the villages.
